publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4582 Jackie Baillie: You Could be Heroes - Just for One Day—That the Parliament congratulates Helensburgh Heroes on its successful recording of the legendary David Bowie song Heroes; notes that the non–profit organisation set up last year has recorded its own version of the popular song and is planning on releasing it for charity; understands that David Bowie’s record company are delighted with the new version and have given the community group permission to release it commercially; further understands that the Helensburgh Heroes group will be unveiling its efforts at the Victoria Halls in Helensburgh on 1 August 2009, and wishes it every success with the world premiere of the new Heroes recording and film of its journey. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jackson Carlaw*, Ross Finnie*, Hugh Henry*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-4582 You Could be Heroes, Just for One Day (lodged on 8 July 2009) Mary Mulligan*
